Actions.Text: REFERENCE CHANGED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Ensures inclusion of lesbian, gay, and bisexual individuals in the award of adult-use cannabis licenses
Summary: Requires the cannabis board's social and equity plan to promote diversity in commerce, ownership and employment, and opportunities for social and economic equity in the adult-use cannabis industry and to award fifty percent of adult-use cannabis licenses to social and economic equity applicants and ensure inclusion of lesbian, gay, and bisexual individuals.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the cannabis law, in relation to ensure the inclusion of lesbian, gay, and bisexual individuals in the award of adult-use cannabis licenses
